div.div: χλαῖνα : cloak, mantle, consisting of a piece of coarse, shaggy woollen cloth, worn double or single, διπλῆ, δίπλαξ, ἁπλοί̄ς, and freq. of a purple color, Il. 22.493, Od. 14.460, 478, 480, 488, 500, 504, 516, 520, 529. It also served as a blanket in sleeping, Od. 20.4, 95, γ 349, Od. 4.50.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
